title: "Fresh" popcorn box lettering

comments.content:
A casual sans like Ed Gothic from House Industries would be a good starting point if you wanted to create something similar.

[http://www.houseindustries.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=150&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109114946/http:/www.houseindustries.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=150&subpage=viewfonts)
